caregiver_profiles.bio: Experienced caregiver with 8 years of experience specializing in dementia care and medication management. Passionate about providing compassionate care to seniors.
caregiver_profiles.availability_notes: Available Monday through Friday, 7 AM to 7 PM. Weekend availability by special arrangement. Prefer assignments within 20 miles of Springfield. Not available during holiday weeks in December.

caregiver_profiles.bio: Certified nursing assistant with 5 years of experience in home care. Specializes in mobility assistance and personal care services.
Licensed practical nurse with 10 years of experience. Expert in wound care, medication administration, and chronic disease management.
Physical therapy assistant with 6 years of experience. Specializes in rehabilitation exercises and mobility training for seniors.
Certified home health aide with 7 years of experience. Provides comprehensive personal care and companionship services.
Registered nurse with 12 years of experience in geriatric care. Expert in medication management and health monitoring.
Bilingual caregiver with 6 years of experience. Specializes in Alzheimer's care and end-of-life support.
Certified occupational therapy assistant with 9 years of experience. Focuses on improving daily living skills for seniors.

packages.name: Basic Personal Care
packages.description: Daily personal care services including bathing and dressing assistance for independent living support.

packages.name: Mobility Support
packages.description: Comprehensive assistance with mobility and daily activities, including meal preparation and safe transfers.

packages.name: Comprehensive Care
packages.description: Full range of personal and medical support services for individuals requiring extensive daily assistance.

packages.name: Memory Care
packages.description: Specialized care for individuals with dementia or Alzheimer's, including cognitive stimulation activities.

packages.name: Respite Care
packages.description: Temporary relief for family caregivers, providing companionship and basic care services.

services.name: Bathing Assistance
services.description: Professional assistance with bathing and personal hygiene

services.name: Dressing Assistance
services.description: Help with dressing and grooming activities

services.name: Mobility Assistance
services.description: Support with walking, transfers, and mobility exercises

services.name: Meal Preparation
services.description: Preparing nutritious meals according to dietary requirements

services.name: Medication Reminders
services.description: Ensuring timely medication intake and monitoring

services.name: Light Housekeeping
services.description: Basic cleaning and organization of living spaces

services.name: Transportation Assistance
services.description: Help with transportation to appointments and errands

task_packages.name: Post-Surgery Recovery Plan
task_packages.description: Comprehensive care plan for knee surgery recovery including mobility assistance and daily living support
task_packages.goals: Assist with daily activities during knee surgery rehab; improve mobility and independence

task_packages.name: Diabetes Management Support
task_packages.description: Daily care tasks focused on diabetes management and general wellness support
task_packages.goals: Monitor blood sugar levels, medication reminders, and healthy meal preparation

task_packages.name: Memory Care Assistance
task_packages.description: Specialized care tasks for clients with dementia including cognitive stimulation and safety monitoring
task_packages.goals: Maintain cognitive function and ensure safety during daily activities

task_packages.name: Companionship & Light Assistance
task_packages.description: Regular companionship services with light housekeeping and meal preparation for elderly client
task_packages.goals: Provide social interaction, light household support, and nutritious meal preparation

task_packages.name: Emotional Support & Recovery
task_packages.description: Specialized care plan focusing on emotional wellbeing and recovery support during difficult period
task_packages.goals: Provide emotional support, companionship, and assistance with daily tasks during recovery

task_packages.name: Physical Therapy Support Plan
task_packages.description: Comprehensive care plan supporting physical therapy goals and mobility improvement
task_packages.goals: Support physical therapy exercises, monitor progress, and assist with mobility activities

task_packages.name: Weekly Routine Maintenance
task_packages.description: Ongoing care plan for consistent daily personal care and routine establishment
task_packages.goals: Maintain independence with personal care, establish consistent daily routines, monitor health indicators

task_packages.name: Diabetes Monitoring & Education
task_packages.description: Enhanced diabetes management with education components and family involvement
task_packages.goals: Stabilize blood sugar levels, educate on self-management, involve family in care plan

task_packages.name: Independence & Social Engagement
task_packages.description: Care plan focused on maintaining independence while providing social interaction and light support
task_packages.goals: Encourage independence in ADLs, provide social companionship, maintain household organization

Looking for memory care services for my father with Alzheimer's. Need someone with experience in cognitive stimulation.
Need respite care for my mother while I attend a family event out of town.
Exploring options for long-term care for my husband who has Parkinson's disease.
